scopes-declaration.motion.view.name: View
scopes-declaration.motion.view.descripti: Show all axis and kinematic data (e.g. position, limits, units, etc.), axis profiles, point tables, product coordinate systems, protection zones and work areas
scopes-declaration.motion.operate.name: Operate
scopes-declaration.motion.operate.descri:
- Show all axis and kinematic data (e.g. position, limits, units, etc.), axis profiles, point tables, product coordinate systems, protection zones and work areas
- Switch Operating state (Configuration & Running)
- Execute movement commands
- Add, edit and change teach points
scopes-declaration.motion.manage.name: Manage
scopes-declaration.motion.manage.descrip:
- Show all axis and kinematic data (e.g. position, limits, units, etc.), axis profiles, point tables, product coordinate systems, protection zones and work areas
- Switch Operating state (Configuration & Running)
- Execute movement commands
- Add, edit and change teach points
- Add and delete axes, kinematics, axis profiles, point tables, product coordinate systems, protection zones and work areas
- Read and write all values
